title: Emu Oil Shampoo & Conditioner Set (8oz Set)
description: Energizing and body building Emu oil based shampoo leaves hair clean, soft and manageable. It helps restore body, shine and softness to all hair types as it gently cleans your hair. Great for damaged hair. Use on a regular basis for dandruff, hair loss, or itchy scalp. Emu Shampoo is extremely rich in omega 3's. Emu Oil has been known to awaken sleeping hair follicles and may help reduce the amount of gray in the hair. Tests run by Dr. Michael Hollick Show that people that used emu oil on the scalp show at least 20% more active hair growth. Perfect for men or women and mild enough for children! It is even great for pets too!
